experience.title: Credit Risk Analyst
experience.description: Automated the manual process of data quality with refined checks such as Integrity, Stability, Completeness along with statistical, dispersion & position measures like median, mode, standard deviation, skewness, kurtosis & percentiles.Recommended to incorporate additional scans like consistency, currency, benchmarking, uniqueness and sensitivity analysis of data.Succeeded in reducing error rates, costs, risks and time, boosted internal reporting, enhanced productivity and precision.
